Package ACT

Interface Act

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActMoveOnly, ActNothing, ActPlayer, ActTurtle
public interface Act
abstract class for functionality
Author:
khaled

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act​(Actor actor, long now)
    abstract method for act functionality that represents how each object should act in game time
    void restrictmovement​(Actor actor)
    This method restricts the actor from going off screen

  • Method Details

    • act

      void act​(Actor actor, long now)
      abstract method for act functionality that represents how each object should act in game time
      Parameters:
      actor - the object that needs functionality
      now - game timer

    • restrictmovement

      void restrictmovement​(Actor actor)
      This method restricts the actor from going off screen
      Parameters:
      actor - the object that needs restriction
